page.title: 10GAMES CHILDREN PLAY 1
page.content: In 1985 there are many popular games. A big favourite is a game called football. In this game there are two teams, each with eleven players. To give you a rough outline I will tell you the basic rules. You are not allowed to touch the ball with your hands but you may touch it with your feet, head, legs, chest and stomach. The aim of the game is to score a goal by kicking the ball in a rectangular frame. The team with the most points after 90 minutes wins the match. Football is usually played by boys.
